fields.description: for ASG, the MVP did not include display of scaling activity, but this helps debug issues. Need to add this to scaling group details for 4.2
fields.summary: add ability to view scaling activity (history) to scaling group details page

comments.body: This is extremely critical for working with AutoScaling groups. Without it you are blind as to what your ASGs are doing. The lack of this functionality required me to use other tools and switch out of the console.
This is already wireframed and ready to go, we didn't have time to implement it in 4.2. Targeting to 4.3. Thanks!

On October 6, 2015, [~jloza] sent the following note to [~lnajjar]:
_
Scaling history is recent activity. So since we added a redundant summary display for 4.2, we should just leave it there to provide a consistent experience for 4.3 and add the actual scaling history tab. No action required on your part._
[~tvo], going to need new help for this tab!
[~kgill], This tab uses a table w/ expando. Let's coordinate about both since you are updating tables and adding expandos.

Verified with Macintosh running Chrome Version 46.0.2490.80 (64-bit), Firefox 41.0.2, and Safari 9.0.1.

Expandos look very helpful to users, [~dkavanagh]. Nice work!

UX review passed. Ready for code review
[~kgill], fwiw, there are zero functional tests for the autoscaling stuff, so that's well beyond the scope of this.

[~dkavanagh]: My understanding is we're requiring PRs to contain selenium tests for new features developed in 4.3.  

/cc [~jloza], [~alice]
[~kgill] I started work on GUI-2232 to help [~dkavanagh]
Punting back to get some functional test goodness added.
pr updated w/ test. See last commit to this branch.
Punting back for fixes suggested in PR comments.
updated PR, and replied to some comments.
